title: Natasha's Chicken Burgers
ingredients: ½ cup Italian-seasoned bread crumbs, divided
salt and ground black pepper to taste
method: Step 2: Mix ground chicken, 1/4 cup bread crumbs, onion, egg, and garlic in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper.
Step 3: Moisten hands and shape chicken mixture, 2 tablespoons at a time, into flat, oval-shaped patties.
Step 4: Spread remaining 1/4 cup bread crumbs in a shallow dish. Dip patties in bread crumbs to coat.
Step 5: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Step 6: Cook patties in hot oil until deeply browned on the bottoms, 5 to 6 minutes.
Step 7: Turn patties and cook until other sides are browned, 3 to 4 minutes more. Serve and enjoy!
